001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Boundable;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
007
008import java.util.function.Predicate;
009
010public abstract class Projectile<B extends Boundable> {
011    public static final double GRAVITY = 9.81;
012    public static final double EPSILON = 0.001;
013
014    protected final Raycast<B> raycast;
015    protected Vector3 position;
016    protected Vector3 velocity;
017    protected double gravity;
018    protected double dragCoeff;
019    protected double dragArea;
020    protected double mass;
021
022    private double travelled;
023    private int collisions;
024
025    public Projectile(Raycast<B> raycast, Vector3 position, Vector3 velocity, double gravity, double dragCoeff, double dragArea, double mass) {
026        this.raycast = raycast;
027        this.position = position;
028        this.velocity = velocity;
029        this.gravity = gravity;
030        this.dragCoeff = dragCoeff;
031        this.dragArea = dragArea;
032        this.mass = mass;
033    }
034
035    public Raycast<B> raycast() { return raycast; }
036
037    public Vector3 position() { return position; }
038    public void position(Vector3 position) { this.position = position; }
039
040    public Vector3 velocity() { return velocity; }
041    public void velocity(Vector3 velocity) { this.velocity = velocity; }
042
043    public double gravity() { return gravity; }
044    public void gravity(double gravity) { this.gravity = gravity; }
045
046    public double dragCoeff() { return dragCoeff; }
047    public void dragCoeff(double dragCoeff) { this.dragCoeff = dragCoeff; }
048
049    public double dragArea() { return dragArea; }
050    public void dragArea(double dragArea) { this.dragArea = dragArea; }
051
052    public double mass() { return mass; }
053    public void mass(double mass) { this.mass = mass; }
054
055    protected abstract double mediumDensity(Vector3 pos);
056    protected abstract Predicate<B> test();
057
058    public double travelled() { return travelled; }
059    public int collisions() { return collisions; }
060
061    public void tick(TaskContext ctx) {
062        double step = ctx.delta() / 1000d;
063        double sqrSpeed = velocity.sqrLength();
064
065        if (sqrSpeed > 0) {
066            double speed = Math.sqrt(sqrSpeed);
067            double distance = speed * step;
068            Vector3 origin = position;
069            Vector3 direction = velocity.divide(speed);
070            var ray = raycast.cast(position, direction, distance, test());
071            position = ray.pos().add(direction.multiply(EPSILON));
072            travelled += ray.distance() + EPSILON;
073            var hit = ray.hit();
074            // TODO hit
075            if (hit != null) {
076                ctx.cancel();
077                return;
078            }
079            step(ctx, ray, origin, direction);
080
081            double mediumDensity = mediumDensity(position);
082            double drag = drag(mediumDensity, dragCoeff, dragArea, sqrSpeed, mass);
083
084            velocity = direction.multiply(Math.max(EPSILON, speed - drag * step));
085            velocity = velocity.y(velocity.y() - (gravity * step));
086        }
087    }
088
089    protected void step(TaskContext ctx, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Vector3 origin, Vector3 direction) {}
090
091    /*
092    mediumDensity = kg/m3
093    dragCoeff = (unitless, 0 -> inf)
094    area = m^2
095    sqrSpeed = m/s
096    mass = kg
097     */
098    public static double drag(double mediumDensity, double dragCoeff, double area, double sqrSpeed, double mass) {
099        return (((mediumDensity * dragCoeff * area) / 2) * sqrSpeed) * mass;
100    }
101}
